pageContext.claim: “It’s moving along rapidly, but still we have a current [immigration] crisis. We have a crisis. I know that you can go back 30 years and you go back 40 years, but I can't imagine it being any worse than it is right now.”
pageContext.analysis: Customs and Border Protection recorded 396,579 apprehensions at the Southwest Border in 2018. As recently as 2000, CBP recorded 1,643,679 apprehensions — nearly four times more.
